## EmailAuthProvider.PROVIDER\_ID property

Always set to [ProviderId](./auth.providerid.md)<!-- -->.PASSWORD, even for email link.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static readonly PROVIDER_ID: 'password';
```
